props.title: Fresh Berries
props.description: Enjoy natural, freshly harvested berries from sustainable city farms. Delivered straight to your home – healthy, eco-friendly, delicious, always full of freshness.

products.name: Strawberries
products.description: Juicy and sweet strawberries, perfect for desserts and snacks.

products.name: Blueberries
products.description: Fresh blueberries, rich in antioxidants and flavor.

products.name: Raspberries
products.description: Delicious raspberries, great for smoothies and baking.

props.title: About Us
props.description: At BeerenHaus, we bring the freshness of nature straight into the city. Our berries are grown in modern, sustainable city farms – chemical-free and full of flavor. Harvested with care and delivered quickly, we stand for healthy living, eco-friendliness, and natural quality you can truly taste.
